attributes.background: Please give Phil Scraton the Knighthood he deserves for his tireless criminological work & support of the families of the Hillsborough Disaster, finally culminating with truth and justice, hidden and obscured from them for 27 years.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
